text: niṅṅaḷēāṭuḷḷa daivadūtanṟe viḷi niṅṅaḷ an'yēān'yaṁ viḷikkunvidhaṅkaruti avagaṇikkarut. maṟṟuḷḷavare maṟayākki niṅṅaḷilninn ūriccāṭunnavare allāhu nannāyaṟiyunnuṇṭ. atināl addēhattinṟe kalpana laṅghikkunnavar taṅṅaḷe vallavipattuṁ bādhikkumennēā nēāvēṟiya śikṣa piṭikūṭumennēā tīrccayāyuṁ bhayappeṭṭukeāḷḷaṭṭe
